info.title: Memorylake API
info.description: The most advanced memorylake - Project and Document management API. All endpoints require the X-User-ID header for user identification.

tags.name: Connectors
tags.description: Third-party service connector APIs - Handle OAuth authentication for external providers like WPS, Feishu, etc.

tags.name: Drives
tags.description: Drive management APIs - Manage files and folders in user's drive

tags.name: Projects
tags.description: Project management APIs - Create, read, update and delete projects, manage project-document and project-memory associations

tags.name: WPS Connectors
tags.description: WPS Connector management APIs - Manage WPS document library connectors

tags.name: Arena
tags.description: Arena related APIs for user profile and project management

get.description: Retrieves a project by its ID. Returns project details including document and memory counts.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

put.description: Updates an existing project's name and/or description

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

delete.description: Soft deletes a project. The project is marked as deleted but not removed from the database.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

get.description: Retrieves a specific memory item from the project's associated memory.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

404.description: Project or memory item not found

put.description: Updates an existing memory item in the project's associated memory.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

404.description: Project or memory item not found

delete.description: Deletes a memory item from the project's associated memory.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

404.description: Project or memory item not found

put.description: Sets extended attributes on an item (file or directory).

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

delete.description: Deletes extended attributes from an item (file or directory) by keys.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of keys to delete

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

get.description: Returns a paginated list of projects created by the current user with optional filtering by name. User is identified by X-User-ID header.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

post.description: Creates a new project with the provided name and description. Returns the created project with a generated ID in format proj-{uuid}

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

400.description: Invalid request - name or description missing

get.description: Returns a list of memory items from the project's associated memory

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

post.description: Creates a new memory item in the project's associated memory. Returns the created item ID.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

requestBody.description: Memory item details to add to the project

400.description: Invalid request or project has no associated memory

get.description: Returns a paginated list of documents associated with the project, including document ID, file name, and creation time

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

post.description: Creates project documents by importing files from drive. Creates datasources in the project's dataset and associates the files with the project.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

requestBody.description: List of drive item IDs of the files to import

400.description: Invalid request - unsupported file type or invalid drive item IDs

delete.description: Removes documents from a project (soft delete). The associations are marked as deleted.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

requestBody.description: List of project document IDs to delete

404.description: Project or document associations not found

post.description: Quick add a document to the project. The file should be uploaded to S3 first via /api/v1/upload endpoints. This endpoint will idempotently initialize the user's drive and My Space if they don't exist, upload the file to My Space with automatic name conflict resolution, and create the project document association.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

400.description: Invalid request - missing required fields or unsupported file type

404.description: Project not found or object key not found in S3

get.description: Returns a list of API keys associated with the project's dataset. Only the key suffix (last 4 characters) is returned for security purposes.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

post.description: Creates a new API key for the project's associated dataset. The full API key secret is only returned once during creation.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

get.description: Gets the drive for the current user. Each user has exactly one drive.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

post.description: Creates a new drive for the current user. Each user has exactly one drive. This operation is idempotent: if drive already exists, returns the existing drive.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

201.description: Drive created successfully or already exists (idempotent)

post.description: Creates a mount point by creating a storage instance and mounting it at the specified parent item.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

requestBody.description: Request for creating a mount point

404.description: Drive or parent item not found

get.description: Lists files and directories under the specified parent item.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

post.description: Creates a new file or folder in the specified parent directory. Use item_type=file/folder.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

409.description: Directory contains a file or directory with the same name

post.summary: Create or get user arena profile
post.description: Creates an arena profile for the current user if it doesn't exist. If the user already has an arena profile, returns the existing project ID. The user ID is obtained from the X-User-ID header.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

200.description: Arena profile created or retrieved successfully

post.description: Upload a document to the arena folder in user's My Space and create a project document association. The file should be uploaded to S3 first via /api/v1/upload endpoints. If the arena folder doesn't exist, it will be created. If a file with the same name exists, a suffix (_1, _2, etc.) will be added.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

400.description: Invalid request - missing required fields or unsupported file type

404.description: Project not found or object key not found in S3

post.description: Scans all non-deleted projects with missing mem0_proj_id, creates mem0 project for each and updates the binding. For internal use. No X-User-ID required.

patch.description: Moves an item (file or directory) to a different parent directory.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

patch.description: Renames an item (file or directory) by updating its name.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

get.description: Gets an item (file or directory) by its ID.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

delete.description: Deletes an item (file or directory) by its ID.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

get.description: Generates a download URL for the specified item.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

get.description: Downloads the binary content of a file. Redirects to download URL if no additional headers are required, otherwise proxies the download.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

200.description: Binary content returned successfully (when proxy is needed)

303.description: Redirect to download URL (when no additional headers needed)

get.description: Lists available WPS document libraries that can be connected as mount points. Uses the current user's WPS credential from database.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

401.description: User not authenticated or WPS credential not found

get.description: Checks if the current user has connected to the specified provider. Returns only the connection status.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

get.description: Initiates OAuth login flow for the specified provider. Returns a 303 redirect to the provider's OAuth authorization URL.

parameters.name: api_endpoint
parameters.description: API host URL for OAuth callback

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

get.description: Handles OAuth callback from the provider. Receives authorization code and state, creates credential, and saves to database.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

get.description: Query document processing status from both MemoryLake and Supermemory. Returns combined status: 'success' when both are done, 'processing' when any is still running, 'failed' when any has failed.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

delete.description: Deletes an API key from the project's dataset. This is a soft delete and the key will no longer be usable for authentication.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

404.description: Project or API key not found

delete.description: Deletes a WPS connection including all associated mount points and the storage instance.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

delete.description: Revokes the connector for the specified provider. Calls knowledge API to revoke the credential and soft deletes the database record.

parameters.name: X-User-ID
parameters.description: User ID for authentication and filtering (Required)

400.description: No credentials found for this provider

ProjectUpdateRequest.description: Request payload for updating an existing project

description.example: Updated project description with new information

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

datasetId.description: ID of the dataset associated with this project

memoryId.description: ID of the memory associated with this project

createdBy.description: ID of the user who created this project

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the project was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the project was last updated

deletedAt.description: Timestamp when the project was deleted (null if not deleted)

documentCount.description: Number of documents associated with this project

memoryCount.description: Number of memories associated with this project

ProjectMemoryRequest.description: Request payload for adding a memory item to a project

metadata.description: Additional metadata for the memory item

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

ItemXattrSetRequest.description: Request payload for setting extended attributes on an item

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

ProjectCreateRequest.description: Request payload for creating a new project

description.example: This project contains documents and memories related to my research

drive_item_ids.description: List of drive item IDs of the files to import

QuickAddDocumentRequest.description: Request payload for quick add document to project

object_key.description: Object key (e.g., S3 key) of the uploaded file

file_name.description: File name to be used in My Space

QuickAddDocumentResponse.description: Response for quick add document to project

drive_item_id.description: Drive item ID of the created file

file_name.description: Final file name (may include suffix if there was a name conflict)

created_at.description: Timestamp when the file was created
Timestamp when the drive was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the drive was last updated

MountPointCreateRequest.description: Base request for creating a mount point

WPSMountPointCreateRequest.description: Request for creating a WPS mount point

FileCreateRequest.description: Request payload for creating a file

object_key.description: Object key (e.g., S3 key, OSS key)

FolderCreateRequest.description: Request payload for creating a folder

ArenaProfileResponse.description: Arena profile response containing the project ID

projId.description: Project ID associated with the user's arena profile

mem0OrgId.description: Mem0 organization ID associated with the user's arena profile

mem0ProjId.description: Mem0 project ID associated with the user's arena profile

datasetId.description: Dataset ID associated with the user's arena profile

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

ArenaDocumentRequest.description: Request payload for creating an arena document

project_id.description: Project ID to associate the document with

ArenaDocumentResponse.description: Response payload for arena document creation

drive_item_id.description: Drive item ID of the created file

file_name.description: Final file name after conflict resolution

InitializeMem0ProjectsResponse.description: Result of mem0 project initialization job

initializedCount.description: Number of projects for which mem0 project was created and bound

failedCount.description: Number of projects that failed to initialize

ItemMoveRequest.description: Request payload for moving an item to a different parent

ItemRenameRequest.description: Request payload for renaming an item

items.description: List of items in the current page

total.description: Total number of items across all pages

size.description: File size in bytes (only for files)

mount_point.description: Mount point details). If null, this is a regular file/directory

headers.description: Additional headers required for download request

download_url.description: Download URL generated by knowledge drive

continuation_token.description: Continuation token for pagination (null if last page)

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

connected.description: Whether user has connected to this provider

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful
Indicates if the request was successful

ArenaDocumentStatusResponse.description: Response payload for arena document status

status.description: Combined status of both MemoryLake and Supermemory

ids.description: List of project document IDs to delete
